avalancheActivity.comment: Human triggered slab avalanche fell in Hrafnbjörg by Skriða, 10-12/4. Natural avalanches in SW aspects around Skjaldbreiður have fallen in the last weeks.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow is considered rather stable but chances of wet avalanches increases in rainy weather this weekend. Cornice collapse is possible and small slab avalanches also. Thin snow cover and risk of slip and slide falls.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Old wind slabs are possible on firn high in mountains, especially inland, but the snow cover is mostly considered stable. A snow pit was taken in Bláfjöll (17th of April) that gave CTM#15 at 112 cm and ECTX. Cornice collapse is possible and potentially could initiate small slab avalanches where wind slabs persist. Thin snow cover and risk of slip and slide falls is high where snow is frozen high in the mountains. Chances of wet avalanche activity during the weekend.

travelAdvisory.comment: It thawed in all Iceland on Saturday. The snowpack is getting warmer in most places and wet avalanches could occur, especially in the sun in the coming days.
travelAdvisory.highlights: It thawed in all Iceland on Saturday. The snowpack is getting warmer in most places and wet avalanches could occur, especially in the sun in the coming days.

weatherForecast.highlights: Styttir upp og lægir með sunnudeginum og hæglætis veður eftir helgi. Dægursveiflur í hitastigi og hlýindi í kortunum.

avalancheActivity.comment: A few sluffs occurred in the thaw on Saturday. Two avalanches occurred in Snæfjallaströnd more than a week ago.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Saturday was warm with rain. Wet avalanches could occur while the snowpack adjusts.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Temperature rose on Saturday with rain. Wet avalanches could occur in the area in the next few days while the snowpack adjusts. Windslabs were present on top of older firn.

travelAdvisory.comment: It thawed in all Iceland on Saturday. The snowpack is getting warmer in most places and wet avalanches could occur, especially in the sun in the coming days.
travelAdvisory.highlights: It thawed in all Iceland on Saturday. The snowpack is getting warmer in most places and wet avalanches could occur, especially in the sun in the coming days.

weatherForecast.highlights: Hvöss SV-átt á sunnudag með kólnandi veðri og dálítilli snjókomu um morguninn. Hægar suðlægar eða breytilegar áttir á mánudag og þriðjudag og léttskýjað.

avalancheActivity.comment: Several slabs in E-NE winds a week ago and a big slab avalanche in the NW-winds on Monday in Fljót. Many slab avalanches in repeated northerly snowstorms since the weekend before Easter. Several human triggered slabs were released and many big natural occured during the snowstorms
avalancheActivity.highlights: Persistent weak layer is still present and risk for big avalanches increases due to warming. Layered wind slabs are in most aspects but mainly after prevailing NE winds and SW winds after Sunday.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Prevailing NE winds and heavy snow accumulation have built up layered windslabs after easter and also a week ago in E-NE winds and NW-winds on Monday. Snow pits form the region show a PWL at the interfaces between windslabs and firn and inbetween windslabs as well. A snowpit from Ólafsfjörður 16th of april showed a PWL below a MF crust at the surface of the old firn which failed with medium load and gave sudden planar fracture. This weakness may be at significant depths due to heavy snow accumulation lately and intense warming during the weekend could trigger large avalanches.

travelAdvisory.comment: It thawed in all Iceland on Saturday. The snowpack is getting warmer in most places and wet avalanches could occur, especially in the sun in the coming days.
travelAdvisory.highlights: It thawed in all Iceland on Saturday. The snowpack is getting warmer in most places and wet avalanches could occur, especially in the sun in the coming days.

weatherForecast.highlights: VSV úrkomuskot gengur yfir aðfaranótt sunnudags með snjókomu til fjalla. Það hvessir með sunnudeginum og gæti vindur farið upp fyrir 30 m/sek til fjalla. Styttir upp og lægir eftir helgi með dægusveiflum í hitastigi.

avalancheActivity.comment: A few small avalanches occurred in the thaw on Satuday. Several loose avalanches seen by Neskaupstaður on Tuesday and Wednesday. Few small avalanches have been seen around the area after last weeks snowfall and warming.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Saturday was warm and small sluffs were seen in the area. Small avalanches could continue to occur in the sun in the next few days. A lot of snow is still in the mountains and inland, and a weak layer could still be present.

snowpackStructure.highlights: A lot of snow is still in the mountains. Saturday was warm and a few small sluffs occurred in the area. Layered wind slabs were present with weak layers between slabs. Cornices are widely on S-W aspects. A deep persistent weak layer could still be present at high elevations.

travelAdvisory.comment: It thawed in all Iceland on Saturday. The snowpack is getting warmer in most places and wet avalanches could occur, especially in the sun in the coming days.
travelAdvisory.highlights: It thawed in all Iceland on Saturday. The snowpack is getting warmer in most places and wet avalanches could occur, especially in the sun in the coming days.

weatherForecast.highlights: V- eða breytileg átt á sunnudag og kólnar um tíma en bjart að mestu. Á mánudag og þriðjudag er útlit fyrir bjart, þurrt og milt veður.
